6925241Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static int A = 10;Di2015NewLine    private static int B = 100;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static byte[] _linear;Di2015NewLine    private static byte[,] _square;Di2015NewLine    private static byte[][] _jagged;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    unsafe static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //init arraysDi2015NewLine        _linear = new byte[A * B];Di2015NewLine        _square = new byte[A, B];Di2015NewLine        _jagged = new byte[A][];Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < A; i++)Di2015NewLine            _jagged[i] = new byte[B];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //set-up the paramsDi2015NewLine        var sw = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine        byte b;Di2015NewLine        const int N = 100000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //one-dim array (buffer)Di2015NewLine        sw.Restart();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < N; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int r = 0; r < A; r++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int c = 0; c < B; c++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    b = _linear[r * B + c];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("linear={0}", sw.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //two-dim arrayDi2015NewLine        sw.Restart();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < N; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int r = 0; r < A; r++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int c = 0; c < B; c++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    b = _square[r, c];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("square={0}", sw.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //jagged arrayDi2015NewLine        sw.Restart();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < N; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int r = 0; r < A; r++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int c = 0; c < B; c++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    b = _jagged[r][c];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("jagged={0}", sw.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //one-dim array within unsafe access (and context)Di2015NewLine        sw.Restart();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < N; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int r = 0; r < A; r++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                fixed (byte* offset = &_linear[r * B])Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    for (int c = 0; c < B; c++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        b = *(byte*)(offset + c);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("unsafe={0}", sw.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.Write("Press any key...");Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6926296Di2015UniqueSeparator        public static bool Invert(Bitmap b)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            BitmapData bmData = b.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, b.Width, b.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int stride = bmData.Stride;Di2015NewLine            System.IntPtr Scan0 = bmData.Scan0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Create the Byte-ArrayDi2015NewLine            int bytes = Math.Abs(bmData.Stride) * b.Height;Di2015NewLine            byte[] p = new byte[bytes];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Copy RGB values into Byte-ArrayDi2015NewLine            System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy(Scan0, p, 0, bytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int nOffset = stride - b.Width * 3;Di2015NewLine            int nWidth = b.Width * 3;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int i = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (int y = 0; y < b.Height; ++y)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int x = 0; x < nWidth; ++x)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                        p[i] = (byte)(255 - p[i]);Di2015NewLine                        ++i;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                i += nOffset;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Copy RGB back to imageDi2015NewLine            System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy(p, 0, Scan0, bytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            b.UnlockBits(bmData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

HightlightsDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool Colorize(Bitmap b, int red, int green, int blue, ColorArea ca)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (red < -255 || red > 255) return false;Di2015NewLine        if (green < -255 || green > 255) return false;Di2015NewLine        if (blue < -255 || blue > 255) return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        BitmapData b.Height;Di2015NewLine        int stride = bmData.Stride;Di2015NewLine        System.IntPtr Scan0 = bmData.Scan0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] p = new byte[bytes];Di2015NewLine              int pdif = (p[i + 2] + p[i + 1] + p[i]) / 3;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int newred = p[i + 2];Di2015NewLine                int newgreen = p[i + 1];Di2015NewLine                int newblue = p[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (ca == ColorArea.Shadows)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    float multi = (1 - newred / 255);Di2015NewLine                    newred += (int)(red * multi);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    multi = (1 - newgreen / 255);Di2015NewLine                    newgreen += (int)(green * multi);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    multi = (1 - newblue / 255);Di2015NewLine                    newblue += (int)(blue * multi);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (ca == ColorArea.Hightlights)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    float multi = (newred / 255);Di2015NewLine                    newred += (int)(red * multi);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    multi = (newgreen / 255);Di2015NewLine                    newgreen += (int)(green * multi);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    multi = (newblue / 255);Di2015NewLine                    newblue += (int)(blue * multi);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (ca == ColorArea.Midtones)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    float multi = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (newred > 127)Di2015NewLine                        multi = 127f / newred;Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                        multi = newred / 127f;Di2015NewLine                    newred += (int)(red * multi);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (newgreen > 127)Di2015NewLine                        multi = 127f / newgreen;Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                        multi = newgreen / 127f;Di2015NewLine                    newgreen += (int)(green * multi);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (newblue > 127)Di2015NewLine                        multi = 127f / newblue;Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                        multi = newblue / 127f;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    newblue += (int)(blue * multi);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                nPixel = newred;Di2015NewLine                nPixel = Math.Max(nPixel, 0);Di2015NewLine                p[i + 2] = (byte)Math.Min(255, nPixel);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                nPixel = newgreen;Di2015NewLine                nPixel = Math.Max(nPixel, 0);Di2015NewLine                p[i + 1] = (byte)Math.Min(255, nPixel);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                nPixel = newblue;Di2015NewLine                nPixel = Math.Max(nPixel, 0);Di2015NewLine                p[i + 0] = (byte)Math.Min(255, nPixel);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                i += 3;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            i += nOffset;Di2015NewLine return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool SCurve(Bitmap b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        BitmapData bmData = b.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, b.Width, b.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int bytes = Math.Abs(bmData.Stride) * b.Height;Di2015NewLine        int stride = bmData.Stride;Di2015NewLine        System.IntPtr Scan0 = bmData.Scan0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] p = new byte[bytes];Di2015NewLine        System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy(Scan0, p, 0, bytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int i = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int nOffset = stride - b.Width * 3;Di2015NewLine        int nPixel;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Point[] points = GetCoordinates();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int y = 0; y < b.Height; ++y)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int x = 0; x < b.Width; ++x)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int hue = (p[i] == 255) ? 255 : -1;Di2015NewLine                int hue1 = (p[i + 1] == 255) ? 255 : -1;Di2015NewLine                int hue2 = (p[i + 2] == 255) ? 255 : -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int p2 = p[i + 2];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (var point in points)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (hue2 == -1 && point.X >= p[i + 2])Di2015NewLine                        hue2 = point.Y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (hue1 == -1 && point.X >= p[i + 1])Di2015NewLine                        hue1 = point.Y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (hue == -1 && point.X >= p[i])Di2015NewLine                        hue = point.Y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (hue != -1 && hue1 != -1 && hue2 != -1)Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                nPixel = hue2;Di2015NewLine                nPixel = Math.Max(nPixel, 0);Di2015NewLine                p[i + 2] = (byte)Math.Min(255, nPixel);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                nPixel = hue1;Di2015NewLine                nPixel = Math.Max(nPixel, 0);Di2015NewLine                p[i + 1] = (byte)Math.Min(255, nPixel);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                nPixel = hue;Di2015NewLine                nPixel = Math.Max(nPixel, 0);Di2015NewLine                p[i + 0] = (byte)Math.Min(255, nPixel);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                i += 3;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            i += nOffset;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.Copy(p, 0, Scan0, bytes);Di2015NewLine        b.UnlockBits(bmData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Point[] GetCoordinates()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<Point> points = new List<Point>();Di2015NewLine        int height = 255;Di2015NewLine        int width = 255;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double y0 = height;Di2015NewLine        double y1 = height;Di2015NewLine        double y2 = height * 0.75d;Di2015NewLine        double y3 = height * 0.5d;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double x0 = 0;Di2015NewLine        double x1 = width * 0.25d;Di2015NewLine        double x2 = width * 0.35d;Di2015NewLine        double x3 = width * 0.5d;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 1000; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double t = i / 1000d;Di2015NewLine            double xt = (-x0 + 3 * x1 - 3 * x2 + x3) * (t * t * t) + 3 * (x0 - 2 * x1 + x2) * (t * t) + 3 * (-x0 + x1) * t + x0;Di2015NewLine            double yt = (-y0 + 3 * y1 - 3 * y2 + y3) * (t * t * t) + 3 * (y0 - 2 * y1 + y2) * (t * t) + 3 * (-y0 + y1) * t + y0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            points.Add(new Point((int)xt, 255 - (int)yt));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        y0 = height * 0.5d;Di2015NewLine        y1 = height * 0.25d;Di2015NewLine        y2 = 0;Di2015NewLine        y3 = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        x0 = width * 0.5d;Di2015NewLine        x1 = width * 0.65d;Di2015NewLine        x2 = width * 0.75d;Di2015NewLine        x3 = width;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < 1000; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            double t = i / 1000d;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            double xt = (-x0 + 3 * x1 - 3 * x2 + x3) * (t * t * t) + 3 * (x0 - 2 * x1 + x2) * (t * t) + 3 * (-x0 + x1) * t + x0;Di2015NewLine            double yt = (-y0 + 3 * y1 - 3 * y2 + y3) * (t * t * t) + 3 * (y0 - 2 * y1 + y2) * (t * t) + 3 * (-y0 + y1) * t + y0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            points.Add(new Point((int)xt, 255 - (int)yt));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return points.ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6926296Di2015UniqueSeparator    public bool SCurve(Bitmap b)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        BitmapData bmData = b.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, b.Width, b.Height), ImageLockMode.ReadWrite, PixelFormat.Format24bppRgb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int bytes = Math.Abs(bmData.Stride) * b.Height;Di2015NewLine        int stride = bmData.Stride;Di2015NewLine        System.IntPtr Scan0 = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int nOffset = stride - b.Width * 3;Di2015NewLine        int nPixel;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int[] points = GetCoordinates();Di2015NewLine        if (points == null)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int y = 0; y < b.Height; ++y)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int x = 0; x < b.Width; 0);Di2015NewLine                p[i + 0] = (byte)Math.Min(255, nPixel);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                i += 3;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            i += 6931891Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic sealed class TestXmlNodeRemovalDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void RemoveNode()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var xmlDocument = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLine        var xmlTrafficPattern = xmlDocument.CreateElement("TrafficPattern");Di2015NewLine        xmlDocument.AppendChild(xmlTrafficPattern);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        xmlTrafficPattern.AppendChild(CreateWayPoint(xmlDocument, Di2015NewLine                           "001", "0.36", "48", "31.7363644", "11", "57.53425"));Di2015NewLine        xmlTrafficPattern.AppendChild(CreateWayPoint(xmlDocument, Di2015NewLine                           "090", "0.56", "48", "31.7363644", "11", "57.53425"));Di2015NewLine        xmlTrafficPattern.AppendChild(CreateWayPoint(xmlDocument, Di2015NewLine                           "240", "0.56", "48", "31.7363644", "11", "57.53425"));Di2015NewLine        xmlTrafficPattern.AppendChild(CreateWayPoint(xmlDocument, Di2015NewLine                           "346", "0.56", "48", "31.7363644", "11", "57.53425"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(@"Original traffic pattern:");Di2015NewLine        DisplayXmlDocument(xmlDocument);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create an arbitrary criterion to remove an elementDi2015NewLine        const string radialToRemove = @"090";Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(@"Remove node with radial=" + radialToRemove);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (xmlDocument.DocumentElement != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (var i = 0; i < xmlDocument.DocumentElement.ChildNodes.Count; ++i)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var radial = Di2015NewLine                xmlDocument.DocumentElement.ChildNodes[i].SelectSingleNode("Radial");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (radial == null || (radial.InnerText != radialToRemove))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var nodeToRemove = xmlDocument.DocumentElement.ChildNodes[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // note that you need to remove node from the ParentDi2015NewLine                if (nodeToRemove.ParentNode != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    nodeToRemove.ParentNode.RemoveChild(nodeToRemove);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(@"New traffic pattern:");Di2015NewLine        DisplayXmlDocument(xmlDocument);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6933997Di2015UniqueSeparatorFunc<SqlDataReader, T>
6933997Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar list = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine// get a SqlDataReaderDi2015NewLinewhile (reader.Read())Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Func<SqlDataReader, T> readRow = GetReader<T>();Di2015NewLine    list.Add(readRow(reader);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6933997Di2015UniqueSeparator ConcurrentDictionary<Type, Delegate> ExpressionCache;  // can't use T here since each Func will have a different TDi2015NewLine
6933997Di2015UniqueSeparator public Func<SqlDataReader, T> GetReader<T>() Di2015NewLine { Di2015NewLine     Delegate d;Di2015NewLine     if(!ExpressionCache.TryGetValue(typeof(T), out d)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         ExpressionCache[typeof(T)] = d = // build and compile lambdaDi2015NewLine     } Di2015NewLine     // cast to strong typed delegate...we don't want to have to DynamicInvoke...that's slowDi2015NewLine     return (Func<SqlDataReader, T>)d;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine
6933997Di2015UniqueSeparator        // hang on to row[string] property Di2015NewLine        var indexerProperty = typeof(SqlDataReader).GetProperty("Item", new[] { typeof(string) });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // list of statements in our dynamic methodDi2015NewLine        var statements = new List<Expression>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // store instance for setting of propertiesDi2015NewLine        ParameterExpression instanceParameter = Expression.Variable(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine        ParameterExpression sqlDataReaderParameter = Expression.Parameter(typeof(SqlDataReader));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create and assign new T to variable: var instance = new T();Di2015NewLine        BinaryExpression createInstance = Expression.Assign(instanceParameter, Expression.New(typeof(T)));Di2015NewLine        statements.Add(createInstance);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var property in typeof(T).GetProperties())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // instance.MyPropertyDi2015NewLine            MemberExpression getProperty = Expression.Property(instanceParameter, property);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // row[property] -- NOTE: this assumes column names are the same as PropertyInfo names on TDi2015NewLine            IndexExpression readValue = Expression.MakeIndex(sqlDataReaderParameter, indexerProperty, new[] { Expression.Constant(property.Name) });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // instance.MyProperty = row[property]Di2015NewLine            BinaryExpression assignProperty = Expression.Assign(getProperty, Expression.Convert(readValue, property.PropertyType));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            statements.Add(assignProperty);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var returnStatement = instanceParameter;Di2015NewLine        statements.Add(returnStatement);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var body = Expression.Block(instanceParameter.Type, new[] { instanceParameter }, statements.ToArray());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /* so we end up withDi2015NewLine         * T Read(SqlDataReader row)Di2015NewLine         * {Di2015NewLine         * var x = new T();Di2015NewLine         * x.Prop1 = (cast)row["Prop1"]Di2015NewLine         * x.Prop2 = (cast)row["Prop2"]Di2015NewLine         * x.Prop3 = (cast)row["Prop3"]Di2015NewLine         * x.Prop4 = (cast)row["Prop4"]Di2015NewLine         * etc.Di2015NewLine         * return xDi2015NewLine         * }Di2015NewLine         */Di2015NewLine        var lambda = Expression.Lambda<Func<SqlDataReader, T>>(body, sqlDataReaderParameter);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // cache me!Di2015NewLine        return lambda.Compile();Di2015NewLine

6939218Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static BsonValue ToBson(Client client)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if (client == null)Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  var doc = new BsonDocument();Di2015NewLine  doc["Name"] = client.Name;Di2015NewLine  doc["Address"] = client.Address;Di2015NewLine  foreach (var f in client.ExtraFields)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var fieldValue = new BsonDocument();Di2015NewLine    fieldValue["Type"] = f.Type;Di2015NewLine    fieldValue["Value"] = f.Value;Di2015NewLine    doc[f.Key] = fieldValue;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return doc;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6939218Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Client FromBson(BsonValue bson)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if (bson == null || !bson.IsBsonDocument)Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  var doc = bson.AsBsonDocument;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  var client = new ClientDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    ExtraFields = new List<ExtraField>(),Di2015NewLine    Address = doc["Address"].AsString,Di2015NewLine    Name = doc["Name"].AsStringDi2015NewLine  };Di2015NewLine  foreach (var name in doc.Names)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    var val = doc[name];Di2015NewLine    if (val is BsonDocument)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      var fieldDoc = val as BsonDocument;Di2015NewLine      var field = new ExtraFieldDi2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        Key = name,Di2015NewLine        Value = fieldDoc["Value"].AsString,Di2015NewLine        Type = fieldDoc["Type"].AsStringDi2015NewLine      };Di2015NewLine       client.ExtraFields.Add(field);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine return client;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6939431Di2015UniqueSeparatorParallel.For
6939431Di2015UniqueSeparatorParallel.For
6939431Di2015UniqueSeparatorParallel.For(0, 10000000, () => new ThreadState(),Di2015NewLine    (i, loopstate, threadstate) =>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ComplexDataSet data = GenerateData(i);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    threadstate.Add(data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return threadstate;Di2015NewLine}, threadstate => threadstate.Dispose());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinesealed class ThreadState : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    readonly IDisposable db;Di2015NewLine    readonly Queue<ComplexDataSet> queue = new Queue<ComplexDataSet>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ThreadState()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // initialize db with a private MongoDb connection.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add(ComplexDataSet cds)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        queue.Enqueue(cds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(queue.Count == 100)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Commit();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void Commit()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        db.Write(queue);Di2015NewLine        queue.Clear();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(queue.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Commit();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            db.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6939431Di2015UniqueSeparatorBlockingCollection
6939431Di2015UniqueSeparator// Specify a maximum of 1000 items in the collection so that we don'tDi2015NewLine// run out of memory if we get data faster than we can commit it.Di2015NewLine// Add() will wait if it is full.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineBlockingCollection<ComplexDataSet> commits =Di2015NewLine    new BlockingCollection<ComplexDataSet>(1000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineTask consumer = Task.Factory.StartNew(() =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // This is the consumer.  It processes theDi2015NewLine        // "commits" queue until it signals completion.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while(!commits.IsCompleted)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ComplexDataSet cds;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Timeout of -1 will wait for an item or IsCompleted == true.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if(commits.TryTake(out cds, -1))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Got at least one item, write it.Di2015NewLine                db.Write(cds);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Continue dequeuing until the queue is empty, where it willDi2015NewLine                // timeout instantly and return false, or until we've dequeuedDi2015NewLine                // 100 items.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                for(int i = 1; i < 100 && commits.TryTake(out cds, 0); ++i)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    db.Write(cds);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Now that we're waiting for more items or have dequeued 100Di2015NewLine                // of them, commit.  More can be continue to be added to theDi2015NewLine                // queue by other threads while this commit is processing.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                db.Commit();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }, TaskCreationOptions.LongRunning);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinetryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // This is the producer.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Parallel.For(0, 1000000, i =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ComplexDataSet data = GenerateData(i);Di2015NewLine            commits.Add(data);Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinefinally // put in a finally to ensure the task closes down.Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    commits.CompleteAdding(); // set commits.IsFinished = true.Di2015NewLine    consumer.Wait(); // wait for task to finish committing all the items.Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6939592Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class DataReaderExtensionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class EnumeratorWrapper<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly Func<bool> moveNext;Di2015NewLine        private readonly Func<T> current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public EnumeratorWrapper(Func<bool> moveNext, Func<T> current)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.moveNext = moveNext;Di2015NewLine            this.current = current;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public EnumeratorWrapper<T> GetEnumerator()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return this;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool MoveNext()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return moveNext();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public T CurrentDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return current(); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static IEnumerable<T> BuildEnumerable<T>(Di2015NewLine            Func<bool> moveNext, Func<T> current)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var po = new EnumeratorWrapper<T>(moveNext, current);Di2015NewLine        foreach (var s in po)Di2015NewLine            yield return s;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<T> AsEnumerable<T>(this T source) where T : IDataReaderDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return BuildEnumerable(source.Read, () => source);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6940042Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic DataTable GetAlertsByDate(DateTime start, DateTime end)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    SqlConnection conn = new SqlConnection(connectionString);Di2015NewLine    SqlCommand cmd = new SqlCommand(Di2015NewLine        "SELECT * FROM Alerts WHERE EventTime BETWEEN @start AND @end", conn);Di2015NewLine    DataTable table = new DataTable();Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SqlParameter param;Di2015NewLine        param = new SqlParameter("@start", SqlDbType.DateTime);Di2015NewLine        param.Value = start;Di2015NewLine        cmd.Parameters.Add(param);Di2015NewLine        param = new SqlParameter("@end", SqlDbType.DateTime);Di2015NewLine        param.Value = end;Di2015NewLine        cmd.Parameters.Add(param);Di2015NewLine        SqlDataAdapter da = new SqlDataAdapter(cmd);Di2015NewLine        da.Fill(table);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        cmd.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        conn.Close();Di2015NewLine        conn.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return table;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6943761Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string path = @"..\\..\\TestFiles\\Test_1.xml";Di2015NewLine    if (File.Exists(path) == true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        XmlDocument xDoc = new XmlDocument();Di2015NewLine        xDoc.PreserveWhitespace = true;Di2015NewLine        using (FileStream fs = new FileStream(path, FileMode.Open))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            xDoc.Load(fs);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Instantiate an XmlNamespaceManager object. Di2015NewLine        System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager xmlnsManager = new System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager(xDoc.NameTable);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Add the namespaces used to the XmlNamespaceManager.Di2015NewLine        xmlnsManager.AddNamespace("x", "http://www.myApps.co.uk/");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create a list of nodes to have the Canonical treatmentDi2015NewLine        XmlNodeList nodeList = xDoc.SelectNodes("/x:ApplicationsBatch/x:Applications|/x:ApplicationsBatch/x:Applications//*", xmlnsManager);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Initialise the stream to read the node listDi2015NewLine        MemoryStream nodeStream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine        XmlWriter xw = XmlWriter.Create(nodeStream);Di2015NewLine        nodeList[0].WriteTo(xw);Di2015NewLine        xw.Flush();Di2015NewLine        nodeStream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Perform the C14N transform on the nodes in the streamDi2015NewLine        XmlDsigC14NTransform transform = new XmlDsigC14NTransform();Di2015NewLine        transform.LoadInput(nodeStream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // use a new memory stream for output of the transformed xml Di2015NewLine        // this could be done numerous ways if you don't wish to use a memory streamDi2015NewLine        MemoryStream outputStream = (MemoryStream)transform.GetOutput(typeof(Stream));Di2015NewLine        File.WriteAllBytes(@"..\\..\\TestFiles\\CleanTest_1.xml", outputStream.ToArray());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6944095Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class LevenshteinDistanceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static int Compute(string s, string t)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(s))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(t))Di2015NewLine                return 0;Di2015NewLine            return t.Length;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(t))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return s.Length;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int n = s.Length;Di2015NewLine        int m = t.Length;Di2015NewLine        int[,] d = new int[n + 1, m + 1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // initialize the top and right of the table to 0, 1, 2, ...Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i <= n; d[i, 0] = i++);Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 1; j <= m; d[0, j] = j++);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int cost = (t[j - 1] == s[i - 1]) ? 0 : 1;Di2015NewLine                int min1 = d[i - 1, j] + 1;Di2015NewLine                int min2 = d[i, j - 1] + 1;Di2015NewLine                int min3 = d[i - 1, j - 1] + cost;Di2015NewLine                d[i, j] = Math.Min(Math.Min(min1, min2), min3);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return d[n, m];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6944348Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void CopyStream(Stream input, Stream output)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] buffer = new byte[32768];Di2015NewLine    while (true)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int read = input.Read (buffer, 0, buffer.Length);Di2015NewLine        if (read <= 0)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        output.Write (buffer, 0, read);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6944516Di2015UniqueSeparator  public class Monitor : IDisposableDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     private List<string> filePaths;Di2015NewLine     private ReaderWriterLockSlim rwlock;Di2015NewLine     private Timer processTimer;Di2015NewLine     private string watchedPath;Di2015NewLine     private FileSystemWatcher watcher;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     public Monitor(string watchedPath)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        filePaths = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        rwlock = new ReaderWriterLockSlim();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.watchedPath = watchedPath;Di2015NewLine        InitFileSystemWatcher();Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     private void InitFileSystemWatcher()Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        watcher = new FileSystemWatcher();Di2015NewLine        watcher.Filter = "*.*";Di2015NewLine        watcher.Created += Watcher_FileCreated;Di2015NewLine        watcher.Error += Watcher_Error;Di2015NewLine        watcher.Path = watchedPath;Di2015NewLine        watcher.IncludeSubdirectories = true;Di2015NewLine        watcher.EnableRaisingEvents = true;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     private void Watcher_Error(object sender, ErrorEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        // Watcher crashed. Re-init.Di2015NewLine        InitFileSystemWatcher();Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     private void Watcher_FileCreated(object sender, FileSystemEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           rwlock.EnterWriteLock();Di2015NewLine           filePaths.Add(e.FullPath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           if (processTimer == null)Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine              // First file, start timer.Di2015NewLine              processTimer = new Timer(2000);Di2015NewLine              processTimer.Elapsed += ProcessQueue;Di2015NewLine              processTimer.Start();Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine           elseDi2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine              // Subsequent file, reset timer.Di2015NewLine              processTimer.Stop();Di2015NewLine              processTimer.Start();Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           rwlock.ExitWriteLock();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     private void ProcessQueue(object sender, ElapsedEventArgs args)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           Console.WriteLine("Processing queue, " + filePaths.Count + " files created:");Di2015NewLine           rwlock.EnterReadLock();Di2015NewLine           foreach (string filePath in filePaths)Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine              Console.WriteLine(filePath);Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine           filePaths.Clear();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           if (processTimer != null)Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine              processTimer.Stop();Di2015NewLine              processTimer.Dispose();Di2015NewLine              processTimer = null;Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine           rwlock.ExitReadLock();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     protected virtual void Dispose(bool disposing)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        if (disposing)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           if (rwlock != null)Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine              rwlock.Dispose();Di2015NewLine              rwlock = null;Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine           if (watcher != null)Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine              watcher.EnableRaisingEvents = false;Di2015NewLine              watcher.Dispose();Di2015NewLine              watcher = null;Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        Dispose(true);Di2015NewLine        GC.SuppressFinalize(this);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  }     Di2015NewLine

validDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="entity">Validated entity.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Returns true if entity is valid.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public null);Di2015NewLine        return Validator.TryValidateObject(entity, context, null, true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Validate whole entityDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="entity">Validated entity.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <exception cref="ValidationException">The entity is not valid.</exception>Di2015NewLine    public static void Validate(object entity)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        AssociateMetadataType(entity);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var context = new ValidationContext(entity, null, null);Di2015NewLine        Validator.ValidateObject(entity, context, true);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Validate single property of the entity.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="TEntity">Type of entity which contains validated property.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="TProperty">Type of validated property.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="entity">Entity which contains validated property.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="selector">Selector for property being validated.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <exception cref="ValidationException">The value of the property is not valid.</exception>Di2015NewLine    public static void ValidateProperty<TEntity, TProperty>(TEntity entity, Expression<Func<TEntity, TProperty>> selector) where TEntity : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (selector.Body.NodeType != ExpressionType.MemberAccess)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("Only member access selector is allowed in property validation");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        AssociateMetadataType(entity);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        TProperty value = selector.Compile().Invoke(entity);Di2015NewLine        string memberName = ((selector.Body as MemberExpression).Member as PropertyInfo).Name;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var context = new ValidationContext(entity, null, null);Di2015NewLine        context.MemberName = memberName;Di2015NewLine        Validator.ValidateProperty(value, context);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Validate single property of the entity.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="TEntity">Type of entity which contains validated property.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="entity">Entity which contains validated property.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="memberName">Name of the property being validated.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <exception cref="InvalidOperationException">The entity does not contain property with provided name.</exception>Di2015NewLine    /// <exception cref="ValidationException">The value of the property is not valid.</exception>Di2015NewLine    public static void ValidateProperty<TEntity>(TEntity entity, string memberName) where TEntity : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type entityType = entity.GetType();Di2015NewLine        PropertyInfo property = entityType.GetProperty(memberName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (property == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException(String.Format(CultureInfo.InvariantCulture, Di2015NewLine                "Entity does not contain property with the name {0}", memberName));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        AssociateMetadataType(entity);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var value = property.GetValue(entity, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var context = new ValidationContext(entity, null, null);Di2015NewLine        context.MemberName = memberName;Di2015NewLine        Validator.ValidateProperty(value, context);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine automatically. These definitions have to be injected.Di2015NewLine    private static void AssociateMetadataType(object entity)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var entityType = entity.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach(var attribute in entityType.GetCustomAttributes(typeof(MetadataTypeAttribute), true).Cast<MetadataTypeAttribute>())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TypeDescriptor.AddProviderTransparent(Di2015NewLine                new AssociatedMetadataTypeTypeDescriptionProvider(entityType, attribute.MetadataClassType), entityType);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6951651Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static void ExcelOperations(string ConnectionString)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DataTable Sheets = new DataTable();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (OleDbConnection connection = new OleDbConnection(ConnectionString))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                connection.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Retrieve the SheetsDi2015NewLine                Sheets = connection.GetSchema("Tables");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Display the SheetsDi2015NewLine                foreach (DataRow sheet in Sheets.Rows)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine(sheet["TABLE_NAME"]);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Take the First SheetDi2015NewLine                string firstSheet = Sheets.Rows[0][2].ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Retrieve contentsDi2015NewLine                DataSet Contents = new DataSet();Di2015NewLine                using (OleDbDataAdapter adapter = new OleDbDataAdapter("select FirstName,LastName,Email,Mobile from [" + firstSheet + "]", connection))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    adapter.Fill(Contents, "MyTable");Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Display the contentsDi2015NewLine                foreach (DataRow content in Contents.Tables["MyTable"].Rows)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine(content[0] + " | " + content[1] + " | " + content[2] + " | " + content[3]);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Remove First Row; 6956077Di2015UniqueSeparatorhref="     # Match href="Di2015NewLine(          # Capture...Di2015NewLine (?:       # the following group:Di2015NewLine  (?!      # Look ahead to check that the next part of the string isn't...Di2015NewLine   \\b      # the entire wordDi2015NewLine   exclude # excludeDi2015NewLine   \\b      # (\\b are word boundary anchors)Di2015NewLine  )        # End of lookaheadDi2015NewLine  [^"]     # If successful, match any character except for a quoteDi2015NewLine )*        # Repeat as often as possibleDi2015NewLine)          # End of capturing group 1Di2015NewLine[^#]"      # Match a non-# character and the closing quote.Di2015NewLine

6956513Di2015UniqueSeparatorExecuteWithRetry (delegate {Di2015NewLine    // retry the whole connection attempt each timeDi2015NewLine    HttpWebRequest request = ...;Di2015NewLine    response = request.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine    ...Di2015NewLine});Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void ExecuteWithRetry (Action action) {Di2015NewLine    // Use a maximum count, we don't want to loop foreverDi2015NewLine    // Alternativly, you could use a time based limit (eg, try for up to 30 minutes)Di2015NewLine    const int maxRetries = 5;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bool done = false;Di2015NewLine    int attempts = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    while (!done) {Di2015NewLine        attempts++;Di2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLine            action ();Di2015NewLine            done = true;Di2015NewLine        } catch (WebException ex) {Di2015NewLine            if (!IsRetryable (ex)) {Di2015NewLine                throw;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (attempts >= maxRetries) {Di2015NewLine                throw;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Back-off and retry a bit later, don't just repeatedly hammer the connectionDi2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep (SleepTime (attempts));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate int SleepTime (int retryCount) {Di2015NewLine    // I just made these times up, chose correct values depending on your needs.Di2015NewLine    // Progressivly increase the wait time as the number of attempts increase.Di2015NewLine    switch (retryCount) {Di2015NewLine        case 0: return 0;Di2015NewLine        case 1: return 1000;Di2015NewLine        case 2: return 5000;Di2015NewLine        case 3: return 10000;Di2015NewLine        default: return 30000;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate bool IsRetryable (WebException ex) {Di2015NewLine    returnDi2015NewLine        ex.Status == WebExceptionStatus.ReceiveFailure ||Di2015NewLine        ex.Status == WebExceptionStatus.ConnectFailure ||Di2015NewLine        ex.Status == WebExceptionStatus.KeepAliveFailure;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

6956949Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic struct GD { public double x, y, a, b, c, d; public byte t; }Di2015NewLinepublic struct Coordinate { public double locX, locY, oriX, oriY, xAxis, yAxis; } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class PDFMaskDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private string _name;Di2015NewLine    public string fun;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string nameDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return _name;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (value.Contains("{"))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _name = value.Substring(0, value.IndexOf("{"));Di2015NewLine                fun = value.Substring(value.IndexOf("{"));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _name = value;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public string key;Di2015NewLine    public byte[] data;Di2015NewLine    public GD[] graphicsDirectives;Di2015NewLine    public Coordinate coordinate;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void parseData(byte[] data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.data = data;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        graphicsDirectives = new GD[100];Di2015NewLine        int gdCount = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] buffer = new byte[100];Di2015NewLine        int bufferCount = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < data.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            switch (data[i])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case (byte)'\\n':Di2015NewLine                    if (bufferCount > 2 && buffer[bufferCount - 2] == ' ' && (buffer[bufferCount - 1] == 'c' || buffer[bufferCount - 1] == 'l' || buffer[bufferCount - 1] == 'm'))Di2015NewLine                        graphicsDirectives[gdCount++] = parseDataWriteGD(buffer, bufferCount);Di2015NewLine                    else if (bufferCount > 3 && buffer[0] == 'q' && buffer[bufferCount - 1] == 'm' && buffer[bufferCount - 2] == 'c')Di2015NewLine                        coordinate = parseDataWriteCoordinate(buffer, bufferCount);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    bufferCount = 0;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                default :Di2015NewLine                    buffer[bufferCount++] = data[i];Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        GD[] actualGraphicsDirectives = new GD[gdCount];Di2015NewLine        Array.Copy(graphicsDirectives, actualGraphicsDirectives, gdCount);Di2015NewLine        graphicsDirectives = actualGraphicsDirectives;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Coordinate parseDataWriteCoordinate(byte[] bytes, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] actualBytes = new byte[count];Di2015NewLine        Array.Copy(bytes, actualBytes, count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string[] values = Encoding.ASCII.GetString(actualBytes).Split(new char[] { ' ' }, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Coordinate c = new Coordinate();Di2015NewLine        c.locX = double.Parse(values[1]);Di2015NewLine        c.locY = double.Parse(values[2]);Di2015NewLine        c.oriX = double.Parse(values[3]);Di2015NewLine        c.oriY = double.Parse(values[4]);Di2015NewLine        c.xAxis = double.Parse(values[5]);Di2015NewLine        c.yAxis = double.Parse(values[6]); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return c;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public GD parseDataWriteGD(byte[] bytes, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte[] actualBytes = new byte[count];Di2015NewLine        Array.Copy(bytes, actualBytes, count);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string[] values = Encoding.ASCII.GetString(actualBytes).Split(new char[] { ' ' }, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        GD gd = new GD();Di2015NewLine        gd.t = (byte)values[values.Length - 1][0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (gd.t == 'c')Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            gd.a = double.Parse(values[0]);Di2015NewLine            gd.b = double.Parse(values[1]);Di2015NewLine            gd.c = 6959510Di2015UniqueSeparatorPdfReader.GetLinks()
6959510Di2015UniqueSeparatorPdfName.URI
6959510Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static List<string> GetPdfLinks(string file, int page)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Open our readerDi2015NewLine        PdfReader R = new PdfReader(file);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Get the current pageDi2015NewLine        PdfDictionary PageDictionary = R.GetPageN(page);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Get all of the annotations for the current pageDi2015NewLine        PdfArray Annots = PageDictionary.GetAsArray(PdfName.ANNOTS);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Make sure we have somethingDi2015NewLine        if ((Annots == null) || (Annots.Length == 0))Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<string> Ret = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Loop through each annotationDi2015NewLine        foreach (PdfObject A in Annots.ArrayList)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Convert the itext-specific object as a generic PDF objectDi2015NewLine            PdfDictionary AnnotationDictionary = (PdfDictionary)PdfReader.GetPdfObject(A);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Make sure this annotation has a linkDi2015NewLine            if (!AnnotationDictionary.Get(PdfName.SUBTYPE).Equals(PdfName.LINK))Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Make sure this annotation has an ACTIONDi2015NewLine            if (AnnotationDictionary.Get(PdfName.A) == null)Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Get the ACTION for the current annotationDi2015NewLine            PdfDictionary AnnotationAction = (PdfDictionary)AnnotationDictionary.Get(PdfName.A);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Test if it is a URI action (There are tons of other types of actions, some of which might mimic URI, such as JavaScript, but those need to be handled seperately)Di2015NewLine            if (AnnotationAction.Get(PdfName.S).Equals(PdfName.URI))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                PdfString Destination = AnnotationAction.GetAsString(PdfName.URI);Di2015NewLine                if (Destination != null)Di2015NewLine                    Ret.Add(Destination.ToString());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Ret;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
6959510Di2015UniqueSeparator        string myfile = System.IO.Path.Combine(Environment.GetFolderPath(Environment.SpecialFolder.Desktop), "Output.pdf");Di2015NewLine        List<string> Links = GetPdfLinks(myfile, 1);Di2015NewLine

6969351Di2015UniqueSeparatornamespace Your_Project _NameDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class TileDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Texture2D texture;Di2015NewLine        Vector2 position;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Initialize()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Draw()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine
6969351Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Initialize(ContentManager Content)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    texture = Content.Load<Texture2D>("YourfloorTexture"); //it will load your texture.Di2015NewLine    position = new Vector2(); //the position will be (0,0)Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
6969351Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Draw(SpriteBatch spriteBatch)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i=0; i<30;i++) //will do a loop 30 times. Each Time i will = Di2015NewLine                                //a valor from 0 to 30.Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            spriteBatch.Draw(texture, position, Color.White);Di2015NewLine            //Will draw the texture once, at the position Vector2 Di2015NewLine            //right now position = (0,0)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            spriteBatch.Draw(texture, new Vector2((int)i,(int)i), Color.White);Di2015NewLine            //Will Draw the texture 30 times, the first time on the position (0,0)Di2015NewLine            //Second Time on (1,1) .. third (2,2) etc...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            spriteBatch.Draw(texture, new Vector2((int)position.X + (i * texture.Width), (int)position.Y + (i * texture.Height), Color.White));Di2015NewLine            //Will Draw the Texture 30 times Spaced by the Width and heightDi2015NewLine            //of the texture (this is the code you need) Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

6972423Di2015UniqueSeparator [Serializable]Di2015NewLine    public class Component_Child_fromxna : BaseComponentAutoSerialization<ISceneEntity>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Vector3 _parentOffset;Di2015NewLine        Matrix _ParentMatrixOffset;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override void OnUpdate(GameTime gameTime)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Get a sceneobject from the ParentObjectDi2015NewLine            SceneObject sceneObject = (SceneObject)ParentObject;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // This relies on the position never being at 0,0,0 for setup, so please don't do thatDi2015NewLine            // or change it with more look ups so that you don't need to rely on a Zero Vector3 :-)Di2015NewLine            if (PassThrough.GroupSetupMode || _parentOffset == Vector3.Zero)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (PassThrough.ParentTranslation != Vector3.Zero)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // The old offset - This is just in world space though...Di2015NewLine                    _parentOffset = sceneObject.World.Translation - PassThrough.ParentTranslation;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Get the distance between the child and the parent which we keep as the offsetDi2015NewLine                    // Inversing the ParentMatrix and multiplying it by the childs matrix gives an offsetDi2015NewLine                    // The offset is stored as a relative xyz, based on the parents object spaceDi2015NewLine                    _ParentMatrixOffset = sceneObject.World * Matrix.Invert(PassThrough.ParentMatrix);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (_parentOffset != Vector3.Zero)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //Matrix pLocation = Matrix.CreateTranslation(_parentOffset);Di2015NewLine                    //sceneObject.World = Matrix.Multiply(pLocation, PassThrough.ParentMatrix);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    sceneObject.World = Matrix.Multiply(_ParentMatrixOffset, PassThrough.ParentMatrix);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

6990345Di2015UniqueSeparator DECLARE @IdCollectionCount         INTDi2015NewLine    , @IdCollection             VARCHAR(250)Di2015NewLine    , @CollectionDelimiter      NVARCHARDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SET @IdCollectionCount = 2;Di2015NewLine    SET @IdCollection = '1,4';Di2015NewLine    SET @CollectionDelimiter= ',';Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    WITH CustomQuery ASDi2015NewLine        (Di2015NewLine        SELECT sc.SpecialismComboId,Di2015NewLine        count(s.SpecialismId) AS ItemCountDi2015NewLine        FROM SpecialismCombo sc Di2015NewLine        inner join SpecialismComboSpecialism scs on sc.SpecialismComboId = scs.SpecialismComboIdDi2015NewLine        inner join Specialism s on s.SpecialismId = scs.SpecialismIdDi2015NewLine        GROUP BY sc.SpecialismComboId Di2015NewLine        HAVING count(s.SpecialismId) = @IdCollectionCountDi2015NewLine        )Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        SELECT Top 1 CustomQuery.SpecialismComboId FROM CustomQueryDi2015NewLine        INNER JOIN SpecialismComboSpecialism scs on CustomQuery.SpecialismComboId = scs.SpecialismComboIdDi2015NewLine        INNER JOIN dbo.fn_SplitDelimited(@IdCollection,@CollectionDelimiter) AS idsDi2015NewLine              ON scs.SpecialismId = CAST(ids.ListValue AS INT)Di2015NewLine        GROUP BY CustomQuery.SpecialismComboId Di2015NewLine        HAVING count(scs.SpecialismId) = @IdCollectionCountDi2015NewLine
6990443Di2015UniqueSeparatorSub SplitCells()Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDim i As LongDi2015NewLineDim j As LongDi2015NewLineDim lastRow As LongDi2015NewLineDim currentValue As StringDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinelastRow = cells(Rows.count, "A").End(xlUp).rowDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFor i = lastRow To 1 Step -1Di2015NewLine    currentValue = cells(i, "A").ValueDi2015NewLine    For j = 1 To Len(currentValue)Di2015NewLine        If IsNumeric(Mid$(currentValue, j, 1)) = True ThenDi2015NewLine            cells(i + 1, "A").EntireRow.InsertDi2015NewLine            cells(i, "A").Value = Left$(currentValue, j - 1)Di2015NewLine            cells(i + 1, "A").Value = Mid$(currentValue, j)Di2015NewLine            Exit ForDi2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine    NextDi2015NewLineNextDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEnd SubDi2015NewLine

6997380Di2015UniqueSeparatorStream responseStream = CopyAndClose(resp.GetResponseStream());Di2015NewLine// Do something with the streamDi2015NewLineresponseStream.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine// Do something with the stream againDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static Stream CopyAndClose(Stream inputStream)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineconst int readSize = 256;Di2015NewLinebyte[] buffer = new byte[readSize];Di2015NewLineMemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineint count = inputStream.Read(buffer, 0, readSize);Di2015NewLinewhile (count > 0)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ms.Write(buffer, 0, count);Di2015NewLine    count = inputStream.Read(buffer, 0, readSize);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinems.Position = 0;Di2015NewLineinputStream.Close();Di2015NewLinereturn ms;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7008704Di2015UniqueSeparatorconst int LUT_SIZE;Di2015NewLineconst int LUT[LUT_SIZE];  // waveform lookup table (typically 2^N, N >= 8)Di2015NewLineFixed index; // current index into LUT (integer + fraction)Di2015NewLineFixed delta; // delta controls output frequencyDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineoutput_value = LUT[(int)index];Di2015NewLine    // NB: for higher quality use the fractional part of index to interpolateDi2015NewLine    //     between LUT[(int)index] and LUT[(int)index + 1], rather than justDi2015NewLine    //     truncating the index and using LUT[(int)index] only. 7011600Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic string Scientific3(double value, int precision)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string fstr1 = "{0:E" + (precision+2).ToString() + "}";Di2015NewLine    string step1 = string.Format(fstr1, value);Di2015NewLine    int index1 = step1.ToLower().IndexOf('e');Di2015NewLine    if (index1 < 0 || index1 == step1.Length - 1)Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception();Di2015NewLine    decimal coeff = Convert.ToDecimal(step1.Substring(0, index1));Di2015NewLine    int index = Convert.ToInt32(step1.Substring(index1 + 1));Di2015NewLine    while(index%3!=0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        index--;Di2015NewLine        coeff *= 10;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    string fstr2 = "{0:F" + precision.ToString() + "}E{1}{2:D3}";Di2015NewLine    return string.Format(fstr2, coeff, ((index < 0) ? "-" : "+"), Math.Abs(index));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7011855Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class NoDropDownBox : ComboBoxDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override bool PreProcessMessage(ref Message msg)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int WM_SYSKEYDOWN = 0x104;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bool handled = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (msg.Msg == WM_SYSKEYDOWN)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Keys keyCode = (Keys)msg.WParam & Keys.KeyCode;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            switch (keyCode)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                case Keys.Down:Di2015NewLine                    handled = true;Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(false==handled)Di2015NewLine            handled = base.PreProcessMessage(ref msg);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return handled;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void WndProc(ref Message m)Di2015NewLine    {            Di2015NewLine        switch(m.Msg)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case 0x201:Di2015NewLine            case 0x203:Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                base.WndProc(ref m);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7012020Di2015UniqueSeparator    public long GetTimeOverlap(long inputStart, long inputEnd)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // I assume you can get the data yourself so heres only the algorithm.Di2015NewLine        long rowStart = new DateTime().Ticks, rowEnd = new DateTime().Ticks;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (inputStart < rowStart)Di2015NewLine            if (inputEnd >= rowEnd)Di2015NewLine                // case 3Di2015NewLine                return rowEnd - rowStart;Di2015NewLine            else if (inputEnd > rowStart)Di2015NewLine                // case 1Di2015NewLine                return inputEnd - rowStart;Di2015NewLine            // Input time is before row time.Di2015NewLine            else return 0;Di2015NewLine        else if (inputStart >= rowEnd)Di2015NewLine            // Input time is after row time.Di2015NewLine            return 0;Di2015NewLine        else if (inputEnd >= rowEnd)Di2015NewLine            // case 2Di2015NewLine            return rowEnd - inputStart;Di2015NewLine            // case 0Di2015NewLine        else return inputEnd - inputStart;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
7012261Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring[] result = input.Split(new string[] {"\\n", "\\r\\n"}, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLine
7012320Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class BaseClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // This method can be "replaced" by classes which inherit this classDi2015NewLine    public virtual void OverrideableMethod()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.Console.WriteLine("BaseClass.OverrideableMethod()");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This method is called when the type is of your variable is "BaseClass"Di2015NewLine    public void Method()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("BaseClass.Method()");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class SpecializedClass : BaseClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // your specialized codeDi2015NewLine    // the original method from BaseClasse is not accessible anymoreDi2015NewLine    public override void OverrideableMethod()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("SpecializedClass.OverrideableMethod()");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // call the base method if you need toDi2015NewLine        // base.OverrideableMethod();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // this method hides the Base Classes code, but it still is accessibleDi2015NewLine    // - without the "new" keyword the compiler generates a warningDi2015NewLine    // - try to avoid method hidingDi2015NewLine    // - it is called when the type is of your variable is "SpecializedClass"Di2015NewLine    public new void Method()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("SpecializedClass.Method()");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7012320Di2015UniqueSeparatorConsole.WriteLine("testing base class");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineBaseClass baseClass = new BaseClass();Di2015NewLinebaseClass.Method();Di2015NewLinebaseClass.OverrideableMethod();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("\\n\\ntesting specialized class");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineSpecializedClass specializedClass = new SpecializedClass();Di2015NewLinespecializedClass.Method();Di2015NewLinespecializedClass.OverrideableMethod();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("\\n\\nuse specialized class as base class");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineBaseClass containsSpecializedClass = specializedClass;Di2015NewLinecontainsSpecializedClass.Method();Di2015NewLinecontainsSpecializedClass.OverrideableMethod();Di2015NewLine

7015117Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO.Compression;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var test = "foo bar baz";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var compressed = Compress(Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes(test));Di2015NewLine        var decompressed = Decompress(compressed);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(Encoding.UTF8.GetString(decompressed));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static byte[] Compress(byte[] data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var compressedStream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine        using (var zipStream = new GZipStream(compressedStream, CompressionMode.Compress))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            zipStream.Write(data, 0, data.Length);Di2015NewLine            zipStream.Close();Di2015NewLine            return compressedStream.ToArray();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static byte[] Decompress(byte[] data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var compressedStream = new MemoryStream(data))Di2015NewLine        using (var zipStream = new GZipStream(compressedStream, CompressionMode.Decompress))Di2015NewLine        using (var resultStream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            zipStream.CopyTo(resultStream);Di2015NewLine            return resultStream.ToArray();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7016219Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class UserDefinedFunctionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static string GetCommandText(int column)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return string.Format("select column_{0} from table", column);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [Microsoft.SqlServer.Server.SqlFunction(Di2015NewLine        DataAccess = DataAccessKind.Read,Di2015NewLine        TableDefinition = "result decimal",Di2015NewLine        FillRowMethodName = "FillRow",Di2015NewLine        SystemDataAccess = SystemDataAccessKind.Read)]Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable fnSum(int columnNo)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var values = new List<long>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (var cmd = new SqlCommand(GetCommandText(columnNo), new SqlConnection("context connection=true")))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            cmd.Connection.Open();Di2015NewLine            using (var reader = cmd.ExecuteReader(CommandBehavior.SingleResult | CommandBehavior.CloseConnection))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                while (reader.Read())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    values.Add(reader.GetInt64(0));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return list;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static void FillRow(object obj, out decimal result)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var values = (List<long>)obj;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        result = values.Sum(value => (decimal) value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7016572Di2015UniqueSeparatorforeach (string item in itemList)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int insertPos = 0;Di2015NewLine    bool itemIsFID = item.Contains("FID");Di2015NewLine    while (insertPos < listBox.Items.Count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Primary sort - put FID items ahead of non-FID itemsDi2015NewLine        bool boxItemIsFID = listBox.Items[insertPos].Contains("FID");Di2015NewLine        if (itemIsFID && !boxItemIsFID)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // The new item must be inserted before the existing itemDi2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Secondary sort - alphabeticalDi2015NewLine        if (item.CompareTo(listBox.Items[insertPos]) > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // The new item must be inserted before the existing itemDi2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Insert the item at the location we've foundDi2015NewLine    if (insertPos < listBox.Items.Count)Di2015NewLine        listBox.Items.Insert(insertPos, item);Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        listBox.Items.Add(item);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7018007Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic const int MaxMemorySize = 800000;Di2015NewLinestatic int FreedMemory = 0;Di2015NewLinestatic int AllocatorCalls = 0;Di2015NewLinestatic int DeallocatorCalls = 0;Di2015NewLinetemplate <typename T>Di2015NewLineclass LocalAllocatorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public:Di2015NewLine      std::vector<char>* memory;Di2015NewLine      int* CurrentUsed;Di2015NewLine      typedef T value_type;Di2015NewLine      typedef value_type * pointer;Di2015NewLine      typedef const value_type * const_pointer;Di2015NewLine      typedef value_type & reference;Di2015NewLine      typedef const value_type & const_reference;Di2015NewLine      typedef std::size_t size_type;Di2015NewLine      typedef std::size_t difference_type;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    template <typename U> struct rebind { typedef LocalAllocator<U> other; };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    template <typename U>Di2015NewLine    LocalAllocator(const LocalAllocator<U>& other) {Di2015NewLine        CurrentUsed = other.CurrentUsed;Di2015NewLine        memory = other.memory;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    LocalAllocator(std::vector<char>* ptr, int* used) {Di2015NewLine        CurrentUsed = used;Di2015NewLine        memory = ptr;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    template<typename U> LocalAllocator(LocalAllocator<U>&& other) {Di2015NewLine        CurrentUsed = other.CurrentUsed;Di2015NewLine        memory = other.memory;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    pointer address(reference r) { return &r; }Di2015NewLine    const_pointer address(const_reference s) { return &r; }Di2015NewLine    size_type max_size() const { return MaxMemorySize; }Di2015NewLine    void construct(pointer ptr, value_type&& t) { new (ptr) T(std::move(t)); }Di2015NewLine    void construct(pointer ptr, const value_type & t) { new (ptr) T(t); }Di2015NewLine    void destroy(pointer ptr) { static_cast<T*>(ptr)->~T(); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bool operator==(const LocalAllocator& other) const { return Memory == other.Memory; }Di2015NewLine    bool operator!=(const LocalAllocator&) const { return false; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    pointer allocate(size_type count) {Di2015NewLine        AllocatorCalls++;Di2015NewLine        if (*CurrentUsed + (count * sizeof(T)) > MaxMemorySize)Di2015NewLine            throw std::bad_alloc();Di2015NewLine        if (*CurrentUsed % std::alignment_of<T>::value) {Di2015NewLine            *CurrentUsed += (std::alignment_of<T>::value - *CurrentUsed % std::alignment_of<T>::value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        auto val = &((*memory)[*CurrentUsed]);Di2015NewLine        *CurrentUsed += (count * sizeof(T));Di2015NewLine        return reinterpret_cast<pointer>(val);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    void deallocate(pointer ptr, size_type n) {Di2015NewLine        DeallocatorCalls++;Di2015NewLine        FreedMemory += (n * sizeof(T));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    pointer allocate() {Di2015NewLine        return allocate(sizeof(T));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    void deallocate(pointer ptr) {Di2015NewLine        return deallocate(ptr, 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineint main() {Di2015NewLine    LARGE_INTEGER frequency;        // ticks per secondDi2015NewLine    LARGE_INTEGER t1, t2;           // ticksDi2015NewLine    double elapsedTime;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // get ticks per secondDi2015NewLine    QueryPerformanceFrequency(&frequency);Di2015NewLine    std::vector<char> memory;Di2015NewLine    int CurrentUsed = 0;Di2015NewLine    memory.resize(MaxMemorySize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    struct custom_hash {Di2015NewLine        size_t operator()(int x) const { return x; }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    boost::unordered_map<int, int, custom_hash, std::equal_to<int>, LocalAllocator<std::pair<const int, int>>> dict(Di2015NewLine        std::unordered_map<int, int>().bucket_count(),Di2015NewLine        custom_hash(),Di2015NewLine        std::equal_to<int>(),Di2015NewLine        LocalAllocator<std::pair<const int, int>>(&memory, &CurrentUsed)Di2015NewLine    );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // start timerDi2015NewLine    std::string str;Di2015NewLine    QueryPerformanceCounter(&t1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i=0;i<10000;i++)Di2015NewLine        dict[i]=i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // stop timerDi2015NewLine    QueryPerformanceCounter(&t2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // compute and print the elapsed time in millisecDi2015NewLine    elapsedTime = ((t2.QuadPart - t1.QuadPart) * 1000.0) / frequency.QuadPart;Di2015NewLine    std::cout << elapsedTime << " ms insert time\\n";Di2015NewLine    int input;Di2015NewLine    std::cin >> input;
