7087079Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class FlashCardDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly string _file;Di2015NewLine    private readonly List<string> _lines;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private int _currentLine;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public FlashCard(string file)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _file = file;Di2015NewLine        _currentLine = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Ensure the list is initializedDi2015NewLine        _lines = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            LoadCard();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // either handle or throw some meaningful message that the cardDi2015NewLine            // could not be loaded.Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void LoadCard()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!File.Exists(_file))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Throw a file not found exceptionDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (var reader = File.OpenText(_file))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string line;Di2015NewLine            while ((line = reader.ReadLine()) != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _lines.Add(line);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string GetPreviousLine()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Make sure we're not at the first line alreadyDi2015NewLine        if (_currentLine > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _currentLine--;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return _lines[_currentLine];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string GetNextLine()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Make sure we're not at the last line alreadyDi2015NewLine        if (_currentLine < _lines.Count - 7089535Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing ICSharpCode.SharpZipLib.Zip;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ENSI.Releaser.CodeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class ZipUtilityDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public void ZipFiles(string inputFolderPath, string outputPathAndFile, string     password)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ArrayList ar = GenerateFileList(inputFolderPath); // generate file listDi2015NewLine        int trimLength = (Directory.GetParent(inputFolderPath)).ToString().Length;Di2015NewLine        // find number of chars to remove     // from orginal file pathDi2015NewLine        trimLength += 1; //remove '\\'Di2015NewLine        FileStream ostream;Di2015NewLine        byte[] obuffer;Di2015NewLine        string outPath = inputFolderPath + @"\\" + outputPathAndFile;Di2015NewLine        var oZipStream = new ZipOutputStream(File.Create(outPath)); // create zip streamDi2015NewLine        if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(password))Di2015NewLine            oZipStream.Password = password;Di2015NewLine        oZipStream.SetLevel(9); // maximum compressionDi2015NewLine        ZipEntry oZipEntry;Di2015NewLine        foreach (string fil in ar) // for each file, generate a zipentryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            oZipEntry = new ZipEntry(fil.Remove(0, trimLength));Di2015NewLine            oZipStream.PutNextEntry(oZipEntry);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!fil.EndsWith(@"/")) // if a file ends with '/' its a directoryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ostream = File.OpenRead(fil);Di2015NewLine                obuffer = new byte[ostream.Length];Di2015NewLine                ostream.Read(obuffer, 0, obuffer.Length);Di2015NewLine                oZipStream.Write(obuffer, 0, obuffer.Length);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        oZipStream.Finish();Di2015NewLine        oZipStream.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private ArrayList GenerateFileList(string dir)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var fils = new ArrayList();Di2015NewLine        bool Empty = true;Di2015NewLine        foreach (string file in Directory.GetFiles(dir)) // add each file in directoryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            fils.Add(file);Di2015NewLine            Empty = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (Empty)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (Directory.GetDirectories(dir).Length == 0)Di2015NewLine            // if directory is completely empty, add itDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                fils.Add(dir + @"/");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (string dirs in Directory.GetDirectories(dir)) // recursiveDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (object obj in GenerateFileList(dirs))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                fils.Add(obj);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return fils; // return file listDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void UnZipFiles(string zipPathAndFile, string outputFolder, string password, bool deleteZipFile)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var s = new ZipInputStream(File.OpenRead(zipPathAndFile));Di2015NewLine        if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(password))Di2015NewLine            s.Password = password;Di2015NewLine        ZipEntry theEntry;Di2015NewLine        string tmpEntry = String.Empty;Di2015NewLine        while ((theEntry = s.GetNextEntry()) != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string directoryName = outputFolder;Di2015NewLine            string fileName = Path.GetFileName(theEntry.Name);Di2015NewLine            // create directory Di2015NewLine            if (directoryName != "")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Directory.CreateDirectory(directoryName);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (fileName != String.Empty)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (theEntry.Name.IndexOf(".ini") < 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string fullPath = directoryName + "\\\\" + theEntry.Name;Di2015NewLine                    fullPath = fullPath.Replace("\\\\ ", "\\\\");Di2015NewLine                    string fullDirPath = Path.GetDirectoryName(fullPath);Di2015NewLine                    if (!Directory.Exists(fullDirPath)) Directory.CreateDirectory(fullDirPath);Di2015NewLine                    FileStream streamWriter = File.Create(fullPath);Di2015NewLine                    int size = 2048;Di2015NewLine                    byte[] data = new byte[size];Di2015NewLine                    while (true)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        size = s.Read(data, 0, data.Length);Di2015NewLine                        if (size > 0)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            streamWriter.Write(data, 0, size);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    streamWriter.Close();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        s.Close();Di2015NewLine        if (deleteZipFile)Di2015NewLine            File.Delete(zipPathAndFile);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7094744Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ConstraintDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double Lower; bool isLowerStrict;Di2015NewLine    double Upper; bool isUpperStrict;Di2015NewLine    bool isIn(double d)Di2015NewLine    { Di2015NewLine        return (isLowerStrict ? Lower < d : Lower <= d) &&Di2015NewLine               (isUpperStrict ? Upper > d : Upper >= d);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Constraint intersect(Constraint other)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Constraint result = new Constraint();Di2015NewLine        if (Lower > other.Lower)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result.Lower = Lower;Di2015NewLine            result.isLowerStrict = isLowerStrict;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (Lower < other.Lower)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result.Lower = other.Lower;Di2015NewLine            result.isLowerStrict = other.isLowerStrict;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result.Lower = Lower;Di2015NewLine            result.IsLowerStrict = isLowerStrict || other.isLowerStrict;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // the same for upperDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool isEmpty()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (Lower > Upper) return true;Di2015NewLine        if (Lower == Upper && (isLowerStrict || isUpperStrict)) return true;Di2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public bool Equals(Constraint other)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (isEmpty()) return other.isEmpty();Di2015NewLine        return (Lower == other.Lower) && (Upper = other.Upper) &&Di2015NewLine               (isLowerStrict == other.IsLowerStrict) &&Di2015NewLine               (isUpperStrict == other.isUpperStrict);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // construction:Di2015NewLine    static Constraint GreaterThan(double d)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Constraint()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Lower = d,Di2015NewLine            isLowerStrict = true,Di2015NewLine            Upper = double.PositiveInfinity,Di2015NewLine            isUpperStrict = falseDi2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static Constraint IsEqualTo(double d)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Constraint()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Lower = d,Di2015NewLine            isLowerStrict = false,Di2015NewLine            Upper = d,Di2015NewLine            isUpperStrict = falseDi2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // etc.Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7100842Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void Traverse(Node root)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (node.Property == someValue)Di2015NewLine        DoSomething(node);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var tasks = new List<Task>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var node in node.Children)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // tmp is necessary because of the way closures close over loop variablesDi2015NewLine        var tmp = node;Di2015NewLine        tasks.Add(Task.Factory.StartNew(() => Traverse(tmp)));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Task.WaitAll(tasks.ToArray());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7105111Di2015UniqueSeparatorBeginReceive
7105111Di2015UniqueSeparatorEndReceive
7105111Di2015UniqueSeparatorReceive
7105111Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void BeginReceiveBuffer()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   _socket.BeginReceive(buffer, 0, buffer.Length, BufferEndReceive, buffer);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void EndReceiveBuffer(IAsyncResult state)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   var buffer = (byte[])state.AsyncState; // This is the last parameter.Di2015NewLine   var length = _socket.EndReceive(state); // This is the return value of the method call.Di2015NewLine   DataReceived(buffer, 0, length); // Do something with the data.Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7105111Di2015UniqueSeparatorEndReceiveBuffer
7105111Di2015UniqueSeparatorbuffer
7105111Di2015UniqueSeparatorstate.AsyncResult
7105111Di2015UniqueSeparatorEndReceive
7105111Di2015UniqueSeparatorStream
7105111Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Socket _socket;Di2015NewLineprivate ArraySegment<byte> _buffer;Di2015NewLinepublic void StartReceive()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ReceiveAsyncLoop(null);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Note that this method is not guaranteed (in factDi2015NewLine// unlikely) to remain on a single thread acrossDi2015NewLine// async invocations.Di2015NewLineprivate void ReceiveAsyncLoop(IAsyncResult result)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // This only gets called once - via StartReceive()Di2015NewLine        if (result != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int numberOfBytesRead = _socket.EndReceive(result);Di2015NewLine            if(numberOfBytesRead == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                OnDisconnected(null); // 'null' being the exception. The client disconnected normally in this case.Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var newSegment = new ArraySegment<byte>(_buffer.Array, _buffer.Offset, numberOfBytesRead);Di2015NewLine            // This method needs its own error handling. Don't let it throw exceptions unless youDi2015NewLine            // want to disconnect the client.Di2015NewLine            OnDataReceived(newSegment);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Because of this method call, it's as though we are creating a 'while' loop.Di2015NewLine        // However this is called an async loop, but you can see it the same way.Di2015NewLine        _socket.BeginReceive(_buffer.Array, _buffer.Offset, _buffer.Count, SocketFlags.None, ReceiveAsyncLoop, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Socket error handling here.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7105111Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class InboundConnectionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Socket _socket;Di2015NewLine    private ArraySegment<byte> _buffer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public InboundConnection(Socket clientSocket)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _socket = clientSocket;Di2015NewLine        _buffer = new ArraySegment<byte>(new byte[4096], 0, 4096);Di2015NewLine        StartReceive(); // Start the read async loop.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void StartReceive() ...Di2015NewLine    private void ReceiveAsyncLoop() ...Di2015NewLine    private void OnDataReceived() ...Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7105369Di2015UniqueSeparator public class FieldsWrapper : IBsonSerializableDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public List<DataFieldValue> DataFieldValues { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public object Deserialize(MongoDB.Bson.IO.BsonReader bsonReader, Type nominalType, IBsonSerializationOptions options)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine        if (nominalType != typeof(FieldsWrapper)) throw new ArgumentException("Cannot deserialize anything but self");Di2015NewLine        var doc = BsonDocument.ReadFrom(bsonReader);Di2015NewLine        var list = new List<DataFieldValue>();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var name in doc.Names)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var val = doc[name];Di2015NewLine            if (val.IsString)Di2015NewLine                list.Add(new DataFieldValue {LocalIdentifier = name, Values = new List<string> {val.AsString}});Di2015NewLine            else if (val.IsBsonArray)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                DataFieldValue df = new DataFieldValue {LocalIdentifier = name};Di2015NewLine                foreach (var elem in val.AsBsonArray)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    df.Values.Add(elem.AsString);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                list.Add(df);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return new FieldsWrapper {DataFieldValues = list};Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Serialize(MongoDB.Bson.IO.BsonWriter bsonWriter, Type nominalType, IBsonSerializationOptions options)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (nominalType != typeof (FieldsWrapper))Di2015NewLine                throw new ArgumentException("Cannot serialize anything but self");Di2015NewLine            bsonWriter.WriteStartDocument();Di2015NewLine            foreach (var dataFieldValue in DataFieldValues)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                bsonWriter.WriteName(dataFieldValue.LocalIdentifier);Di2015NewLine                if (dataFieldValue.Values.Count != 1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var list = new string[dataFieldValue.Values.Count];Di2015NewLine                    for (int i = 0; i < dataFieldValue.Values.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine                        list[i] = dataFieldValue.Values[i];Di2015NewLine                    BsonSerializer.Serialize(bsonWriter, list); Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    BsonSerializer.Serialize(bsonWriter, dataFieldValue.Values[0]); Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            bsonWriter.WriteEndDocument();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7110841Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<Tuple<T, U>> CombineWith<T, U>(this IEnumerable<T> first, IEnumerable<U> second)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var firstEnumerator = first.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    using (var secondEnumerator = second.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        bool hasFirst = true;Di2015NewLine        bool hasSecond = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (Di2015NewLine            // Only call MoveNext if it didn't fail last time.Di2015NewLine            (hasFirst && (hasFirst = firstEnumerator.MoveNext()))Di2015NewLine            | // WARNING: Do NOT change to ||.Di2015NewLine            (hasSecond && (hasSecond = secondEnumerator.MoveNext()))Di2015NewLine            )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return Tuple.Create(Di2015NewLine                    hasFirst ? firstEnumerator.Current : default(T),Di2015NewLine                    hasSecond ? secondEnumerator.Current : default(U)Di2015NewLine                );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7115574Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    this.Page.Title = "test";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Store it in your session...seems like a weird thing to do given how your page should be stateless, so I would think about what you areDi2015NewLine    //trying to do a bit more carefully.  You don't want to call an event handler such as test below from another page in your asp.net app.Di2015NewLine    Dictionary<string, EventHandler> myEvents = null;Di2015NewLine    if (Session["Invokers"] == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        myEvents = new Dictionary<string, EventHandler>();Di2015NewLine        Session["Invokers"] = myEvents;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        myEvents = Session["Invokers"] as Dictionary<string, EventHandler>;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //If the event handler key is not in there then add itDi2015NewLine    if (myEvents.ContainsKey("buttonClickOnPageDefault") == false)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Subscribe to event (i.e. add your method to the invokation listDi2015NewLine        this.TestEvent += new EventHandler(test);Di2015NewLine        myEvents.Add("buttonClickOnPageDefault", this.TestEvent);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //if it does contain this key then you may already be subscribed to event, so unsubscribe in case and then resubscribe...you couldDi2015NewLine        //probably do this more elegantly by looking at the vales in the GetInvokationList method on the eventHandlerDi2015NewLine        //Wire up the eventDi2015NewLine        this.TestEvent -= new EventHandler(test);Di2015NewLine        this.TestEvent += new EventHandler(test);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    //Resave the dictionary.Di2015NewLine    Session["Invokers"] = myEvents;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevoid test(object o, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    this.Page.Title = "testEvent";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic event EventHandler TestEvent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprotected 7116103Di2015UniqueSeparator//Copyright (C) Microsoft Corporation.  All rights reserved.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// See the ReadMe.html for additional informationDi2015NewLinepublic class ObjectDumper {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Write(object element)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Write(element, 0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Write(object element, int depth)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Write(element, depth, Console.Out);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Write(object element, int depth, TextWriter log)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ObjectDumper dumper = new ObjectDumper(depth);Di2015NewLine        dumper.writer = log;Di2015NewLine        dumper.WriteObject(null, element);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    TextWriter writer;Di2015NewLine    int pos;Di2015NewLine    int level;Di2015NewLine    int depth;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private ObjectDumper(int depth)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.depth = depth;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Write(string s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (s != null) {Di2015NewLine            writer.Write(s);Di2015NewLine            pos += s.Length;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void WriteIndent()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < level; i++) writer.Write("  ");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void WriteLine()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        writer.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        pos = 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void WriteTab()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Write("  ");Di2015NewLine        while (pos % 8 != 0) Write(" ");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void WriteObject(string prefix, object element)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (element == null || element is ValueType || element is string) {Di2015NewLine            WriteIndent();Di2015NewLine            Write(prefix);Di2015NewLine            WriteValue(element);Di2015NewLine            WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else {Di2015NewLine            IEnumerable enumerableElement = element as IEnumerable;Di2015NewLine            if (enumerableElement != null) {Di2015NewLine                foreach (object item in enumerableElement) {Di2015NewLine                    if (item is IEnumerable && !(item is string)) {Di2015NewLine                        WriteIndent();Di2015NewLine                        Write(prefix);Di2015NewLine                        Write("...");Di2015NewLine                        WriteLine();Di2015NewLine                        if (level < depth) {Di2015NewLine                            level++;Di2015NewLine                            WriteObject(prefix, item);Di2015NewLine                            level--;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    else {Di2015NewLine                        WriteObject(prefix, item);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else {Di2015NewLine                MemberInfo[] members = element.GetType().GetMembers(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLine                WriteIndent();Di2015NewLine                Write(prefix);Di2015NewLine                bool propWritten = false;Di2015NewLine                foreach (MemberInfo m in members) {Di2015NewLine                    FieldInfo f = m as FieldInfo;Di2015NewLine                    PropertyInfo p = m as PropertyInfo;Di2015NewLine                    if (f != null || p != null) {Di2015NewLine                        if (propWritten) {Di2015NewLine                            WriteTab();Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        else {Di2015NewLine                            propWritten = true;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        Write(m.Name);Di2015NewLine                        Write("=");Di2015NewLine                        Type t = f != null ? f.FieldType : p.PropertyType;Di2015NewLine                        if (t.IsValueType || t == typeof(string)) {Di2015NewLine                            WriteValue(f != null ? f.GetValue(element) : p.GetValue(element, null));Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        else {Di2015NewLine                            if (typeof(IEnumerable).IsAssignableFrom(t)) {Di2015NewLine                                Write("...");Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            else {Di2015NewLine                                Write("{ }");Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                if (propWritten) WriteLine();Di2015NewLine                if (level < depth) {Di2015NewLine                    foreach (MemberInfo m in members) {Di2015NewLine                        FieldInfo f = m as FieldInfo;Di2015NewLine                        PropertyInfo p = m as PropertyInfo;Di2015NewLine                        if (f != null || p != null) {Di2015NewLine                            Type t = f != null ? f.FieldType : p.PropertyType;Di2015NewLine                            if (!(t.IsValueType || t == typeof(string))) {Di2015NewLine                                object value = f != null ? f.GetValue(element) : p.GetValue(element, null);Di2015NewLine                                if (value != null) {Di2015NewLine                                    level++;Di2015NewLine                                    WriteObject(m.Name + ": ", value);Di2015NewLine                                    level--;Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void WriteValue(object o)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (o == null) {Di2015NewLine            Write("null");Di2015NewLine 7118672Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace MBUS_Parse_Test.MDL64_CommunicationDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Extracts MBUS telegrammsDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    class GetMBUS_TelegrammsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    #region EigenschaftenDi2015NewLine    private static List<MbusTelegram> telegrams = new List<MbusTelegram>();Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static List<MbusTelegram> GetTelegramms(byte[] logfile)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int startOfTele = ExtractFirstMBUSTelegramm(logfile);Di2015NewLine        while (startOfTele != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] NewLogFile = new byte[logfile.Length - startOfTele];Di2015NewLine            Buffer.BlockCopy(logfile, startOfTele, NewLogFile, 0, NewLogFile.Length);Di2015NewLine            startOfTele = ExtractFirstMBUSTelegramm(NewLogFile);Di2015NewLine            logfile = NewLogFile;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return telegrams;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static int ExtractFirstMBUSTelegramm(byte[] logfile)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        byte mbus_start = 0x68;Di2015NewLine        int Start = Array.IndexOf(logfile, mbus_start);Di2015NewLine        int offset = 10;Di2015NewLine        if (logfile[Start + 3] == mbus_start)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] newMBUS = new byte[logfile[Start + 1] + offset];Di2015NewLine            Buffer.BlockCopy(logfile, Start, newMBUS, 0, logfile[Start + 1] + offset);Di2015NewLine            MbusTelegram nuMBUS = new MbusTelegram(newMBUS);Di2015NewLine            telegrams.Add(nuMBUS);Di2015NewLine            return (Start + logfile[Start + 1] + offset);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private System.Array ResizeArray(System.Array oldArray, int newSize)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int oldSize = oldArray.Length;Di2015NewLine        System.Type elementType = oldArray.GetType().GetElementType();Di2015NewLine        System.Array newArray = System.Array.CreateInstance(elementType, newSize);Di2015NewLine        int preserveLength = System.Math.Min(oldSize, newSize);Di2015NewLine        if (preserveLength > 0)Di2015NewLine            System.Array.Copy(oldArray, newArray, preserveLength);Di2015NewLine        return newArray;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7119325Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic ServerProcessing ProcessMessage(IServerChannelSinkStack sinkStack, IMessage requestMsg, ITransportHeaders requestHeaders, Stream requestStream, out IMessage responseMsg, out ITransportHeaders responseHeaders, out Stream responseStream)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Pre-processing before sending the message to the next sink in the chainDi2015NewLine    object state = null;Di2015NewLine    ProcessRequest(requestMsg, requestHeaders, ref requestStream, ref state);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ServerProcessing serverProcessing;Di2015NewLine    if (requestMsg != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        /* Call the next sink in the chain */Di2015NewLine        sinkStack.Push(this, state);Di2015NewLine        serverProcessing = this.NextChannelSink.ProcessMessage(sinkStack, requestMsg, requestHeaders, requestStream, out responseMsg, out responseHeaders, out responseStream);Di2015NewLine        sinkStack.Pop(this);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        responseMsg = null;Di2015NewLine        responseHeaders = null;Di2015NewLine        responseStream = null;Di2015NewLine        serverProcessing = ServerProcessing.Complete;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Processing from sink further in the chain has completed. 7123013Di2015UniqueSeparatorDi2015NewLine    public class ReadWriteBufferDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private readonly byte[] _buffer;Di2015NewLine        private int _startIndex, _endIndex;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public ReadWriteBuffer(int capacity)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _buffer = new byte[capacity];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int CountDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (_endIndex > _startIndex)Di2015NewLine                    return _endIndex - _startIndex;Di2015NewLine                if (_endIndex &lt _startIndex)Di2015NewLine                    return (_buffer.Length - _startIndex) + _endIndex;Di2015NewLine                return 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Write(byte[] data)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (Count + data.Length > _buffer.Length) throw new Exception("buffer overflow");Di2015NewLine            if (_endIndex + data.Length >= _buffer.Length)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var endLen = _buffer.Length - _endIndex;Di2015NewLine                var remainingLen = data.Length - endLen;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Array.Copy(data, 0, _buffer, _endIndex, endLen);Di2015NewLine                Array.Copy(data, endLen, _buffer, 0, remainingLen);Di2015NewLine                _endIndex = remainingLen;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Array.Copy(data, 0, _buffer, _endIndex, data.Length);Di2015NewLine                _endIndex += data.Length;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public byte[] Read(int len, bool keepData = false)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (len > Count) throw new Exception("not enough data in buffer");Di2015NewLine            var result = new byte[len];Di2015NewLine            if (_startIndex + len &lt _buffer.Length)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Array.Copy(_buffer, _startIndex, result, 0, len);Di2015NewLine                if (!keepData) _startIndex += len;Di2015NewLine                return result;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var endLen = _buffer.Length - _startIndex;Di2015NewLine                var remainingLen = len - endLen;Di2015NewLine                Array.Copy(_buffer, _startIndex, result, 0, endLen);Di2015NewLine                Array.Copy(_buffer, 0, result, endLen, remainingLen);Di2015NewLine                if (!keepData) _startIndex = remainingLen;Di2015NewLine                return result;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public byte this[int index]Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (index >= Count) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException();Di2015NewLine                return _buffer[(_startIndex + index) % _buffer.Length];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public IEnumerable BytesDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            getDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (var i = _startIndex; i &lt Count; i++)Di2015NewLine                    yield return _buffer[(_startIndex + i) % _buffer.Length];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

Di2015NewLineWebRequest request = WebRequest.Create ("http://www.contoso.com/PostAccepter.aspx ");Di2015NewLine// Set the Method property of the request to POST.Di2015NewLinerequest.Method = "POST";Di2015NewLine// Create POST data and convert it to a byte array.Di2015NewLinestring postData = "This is a test that posts this string to a Web server.";Di2015NewLinebyte[] byteArray = Encoding.UTF8.GetBytes (postData);Di2015NewLine// Set the ContentType property of the WebRequest.Di2015NewLinerequest.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLine// Set the ContentLength property of the WebRequest.Di2015NewLinerequest.ContentLength = byteArray.Length;Di2015NewLine// Get the request stream.Di2015NewLineStream dataStream = request.GetRequestStream ();Di2015NewLine// Write the data to the request stream.Di2015NewLinedataStream.Write (byteArray, 0, byteArray.Length);Di2015NewLine// Close the Stream object.Di2015NewLinedataStream.Close ();Di2015NewLine// Get the response.Di2015NewLineWebResponse response = request.GetResponse ();Di2015NewLine// Display the status.Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine (((HttpWebResponse)response).StatusDescription);Di2015NewLine// Get the stream containing content returned by the server.Di2015NewLinedataStream = response.GetResponseStream ();Di2015NewLine// Open the stream using a StreamReader for easy access.Di2015NewLineStreamReader reader = new StreamReader (dataStream);Di2015NewLine// Read the content.Di2015NewLinestring responseFromServer = reader.ReadToEnd ();Di2015NewLine// Display the content.Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine (responseFromServer);Di2015NewLine// Clean up the streams.Di2015NewLinereader.Close ();Di2015NewLinedataStream.Close ();Di2015NewLineresponse.Close ();Di2015NewLine

7130773Di2015UniqueSeparator// Set up a List<T> to hold the indexes of the visible columnsDi2015NewLineList<int> visibleColumns = new List<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (DataGridViewColumn col in dgv1.Columns)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (col.Visible)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        dgv2.Columns.Add((DataGridViewColumn)col.Clone());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        visibleColumns.Add(col.Index);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Now add the data from the columnsDi2015NewLine// Set a counter for the current row index for the second DataGridViewDi2015NewLineint rowIndex = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (DataGridViewRow row in dgv1.Rows)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Add a new row to the DataGridViewDi2015NewLine    dgv2.Rows.Add();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Loop through the visible columnsDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < visibleColumns.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Use the index of the for loop for the column in the target data gridDi2015NewLine        // Use the index value from the List<T> for the cell of the source target data gridDi2015NewLine        dgv2.Rows[rowIndex].Cells[i].Value = row.Cells[visibleColumns[i]].Value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Increment the rowIndexDi2015NewLine    rowIndex++;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7132864Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var client = new TcpClient("www.google.com", 80))Di2015NewLine        using (var stream = client.GetStream())Di2015NewLine        using (var writer = new StreamWriter(stream))Di2015NewLine        using (var reader = new StreamReader(stream))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            writer.AutoFlush = true;Di2015NewLine            // Send request headersDi2015NewLine            writer.WriteLine("GET / HTTP/1.1");Di2015NewLine            writer.WriteLine("Host: www.google.com:80");Di2015NewLine            writer.WriteLine("User-Agent: Pastebin API 0.1");Di2015NewLine            writer.WriteLine("Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8");Di2015NewLine            writer.WriteLine("Accept-Charset: ISO-8859-1,UTF-8;q=0.7,*;q=0.7");Di2015NewLine            writer.WriteLine("Cache-Control: no-cache");Di2015NewLine            writer.WriteLine("Accept-Language: en;q=0.7,en-us;q=0.3");Di2015NewLine            writer.WriteLine("Connection: close");Di2015NewLine            writer.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine            writer.WriteLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Read the response from serverDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(reader.ReadToEnd());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7132873Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DataImporter<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DataImporter(string tableName, string readerName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _tableName = tableName;Di2015NewLine        _readerName = readerName;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// This is the size of our bulk staging list.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <remarks>Di2015NewLine    /// Note that the SqlBulkCopy object has a batch size property, which may not be the same as this value,Di2015NewLine    /// so records may not be going into the database in sizes of this staging value.Di2015NewLine    /// </remarks>Di2015NewLine    private int _bulkStagingListSize = 20000;Di2015NewLine    private List<ManualResetEvent> _tasksWaiting = new List<ManualResetEvent>();Di2015NewLine    private string _tableName = String.Empty;Di2015NewLine    private string _readerName = String.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void QueueForImport(T record)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_listLock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _items.Add(record);Di2015NewLine            if (_items.Count > _bulkStagingListSize)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                SaveItems(_items);Di2015NewLine                _items = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// This method should be called at the end of the queueing work to ensure to clear down our listDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public void Flush()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_listLock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            SaveItems(_items);Di2015NewLine            _items = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine            while (_tasksWaiting.Count > 64)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Thread.Sleep(2000);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            WaitHandle.WaitAll(_tasksWaiting.ToArray());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void SaveItems(List<T> items)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ManualResetEvent evt = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine        _tasksWaiting.Add(evt);Di2015NewLine        IDataReader reader = DataReaderFactory.GetReader<T>(_readerName,_items);Di2015NewLine        Tuple<ManualResetEvent, IDataReader> stateInfo = new Tuple<ManualResetEvent, IDataReader>(evt, reader);Di2015NewLine        ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(new WaitCallback(saveData), stateInfo);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void saveData(object info)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (new ActivityTimer("Saving bulk data to " + _tableName))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Tuple<ManualResetEvent, IDataReader> stateInfo = info as Tuple<ManualResetEvent, IDataReader>;Di2015NewLine            IDataReader r = stateInfo.Item2;Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Database.DataImportStagingDatabase.BulkLoadData(r, _tableName);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Do somethingDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _tasksWaiting.Remove(stateInfo.Item1);Di2015NewLine                stateInfo.Item1.Set();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private object _listLock = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private List<T> _items = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
7132873Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal static class DataReaderFactoryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    internal static IDataReader GetReader<T>(string typeName, List<T> items)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IDataReader reader = null;Di2015NewLine        switch(typeName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case "ProductRecordDataReader":Di2015NewLine                reader =  new ProductRecordDataReader(items as List<ProductRecord>) as IDataReader;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case "RetailerPriceRecordDataReader":Di2015NewLine                reader =  new RetailerPriceRecordDataReader(items as List<RetailerPriceRecord>) as IDataReader;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return reader;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static string GetSortValue(string source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Match match = new Regex(@"[\\d]+").Match(source);Di2015NewLine        return match.Success ? match.Value : source;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class Column6Comparer : IComparer<string>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private Dictionary<string, int> ValueToOrder { get; set; } Di2015NewLine        public Column6Comparer()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ValueToOrder = new Dictionary<string, int>();Di2015NewLine    ValueToOrder["4444"] = 4;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public int Compare(string x, string y)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return ValueToOrder[GetSortValue(x)].CompareTo(ValueToOrder[GetSortValue(y)]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class RowComparer : IComparer<Row>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int Compare(Row x, Row y)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (x.Column2 == "FIDUCIAL" && y.Column2 == "FIDUCIAL")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return x.Column1.CompareTo(y.Column1);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (x.Column2 == "FIDUCIAL" || y.Column2 == "FIDUCIAL")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return x.Column2 == "FIDUCIAL" ? 0 : 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return x.Column2.Substring(4).CompareTo(y.Column2.Substring(4));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

7137998Di2015UniqueSeparator    public Color AverageColorsWithLINQ(Color[] ColorsToAverage)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // the LINQ wayDi2015NewLine        int AlphaAverage = (int)ColorsToAverage.Average(c => c.A);Di2015NewLine        int RedAverage = (int)ColorsToAverage.Average(c => c.R);Di2015NewLine        int GreenAverage = (int)ColorsToAverage.Average(c => c.G);Di2015NewLine        int BlueAverage = (int)ColorsToAverage.Average(c => c.B);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Color.FromArgb(Di2015NewLine            AlphaAverage, RedAverage, GreenAverage, BlueAverageDi2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
7137998Di2015UniqueSeparator    public Color AverageColorsWithFor(Color[] ColorsToAverage)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int AlphaTotal = 0;Di2015NewLine        int RedTotal = 0;Di2015NewLine        int GreenTotal = 0;Di2015NewLine        int BlueTotal = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (Color AColor in ColorsToAverage)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            AlphaTotal += AColor.A;Di2015NewLine            RedTotal += AColor.R;Di2015NewLine            GreenTotal += AColor.G;Di2015NewLine            BlueTotal += AColor.B;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double NumberOfColors = ColorsToAverage.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int AlphaAverage = (int)(AlphaTotal / NumberOfColors);Di2015NewLine        int RedAverage = (int)(RedTotal / NumberOfColors);Di2015NewLine        int GreenAverage = (int)(GreenTotal / NumberOfColors);Di2015NewLine        int BlueAverage = (int)(BlueTotal / NumberOfColors);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return Color.FromArgb(Di2015NewLine            AlphaAverage, RedAverage, GreenAverage, BlueAverageDi2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

7140899Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Drawing;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Forms;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Bezier : FormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static public void Main ()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Application.Run (new Bezier ());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override void OnPaint (PaintEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // The input with all pointsDi2015NewLine        string CurveDataString = "5.47 93.75 123.22 93.75 240.97 93.75 351.22 177.75 236.47 177.75 121.72 177.75";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string[] CurveDataStringParts = CurveDataString.Split(' ');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int[] Keep = {2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9};Di2015NewLine        float[] CurveData = (from i in Keep select float.Parse(CurveDataStringParts[i])).ToArray();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        e.Graphics.DrawBezier(Pens.Black, CurveData[0], CurveData[1], CurveData[2], CurveData[3],Di2015NewLine                                          CurveData[4], CurveData[5], CurveData[6], CurveData[7]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for(int i = 0; i < CurveData.Length; i += 2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            e.Graphics.FillEllipse(Brushes.Black, new RectangleF(CurveData[i] - 2, CurveData[i + 1] - 2, 4, 4));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        base.OnPaint (e);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
